alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 3:37AM EST until January 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Georgia, Coastal Chatham County. In South Carolina, Beaufort, Coastal Colleton, Charleston, Coastal Jasper and Tidal Berkeley Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even stronger winds could occur on elevated bridges such as the the Ravenel Bridge, the Don Holt Bridge, the James B. Edwards Bridge, the Ben Sawyer Bridge, the Isle of Palms Connector, the Amos Nathaniel Rodgers Bridge, the McKinley Washington Junior Bridge and the Woods Memorial Bridge.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
